title: ZBIGNIEW Protocol Framework Created
description: Open-source political intelligence analysis framework established.

title: Russia Signs 2021 National Security Strategy
description: Putin signs Russia's National Security Strategy, officially branding US and NATO allies as 'unfriendly states' and deprioritizing Western relations.

title: Putin Announces 'Special Military Operation' in Ukraine
description: Putin delivers speech announcing invasion of Ukraine, citing NATO expansion as justification.
quote: I am referring to the expansion of NATO to the east, moving its military infrastructure closer to Russian borders.

title: Putin States Finland/Sweden NATO Membership 'No Threat'
description: Putin contradicts prior NATO rhetoric by stating Finland and Sweden joining NATO poses 'no immediate threat to Russia'.
quote: As far as expansion goes, including new members Finland and Sweden, Russia has no problems with these states... there is no immediate threat to Russia.
note: Contradicts Feb 24 speech citing NATO expansion as existential threat

title: Russia Approves 2023 Foreign Policy Concept
description: Putin approves Russia's first comprehensive foreign policy statement since Ukraine invasion. Explicitly calls for 'eliminating vestiges of US domination.'
quote: eliminating the vestiges of domination by the United States and other unfriendly states in world affairs

title: Senate Intelligence Committee Releases Russia Report Volume 2
description: Bipartisan Senate report documents IRA operations targeting 2016 election 'at the direction of the Kremlin,' specifically targeting African-Americans.
key_findings: African-Americans targeted more than any other group

title: Russian Officials Celebrate Greenland Crisis
description: Russian officials publicly celebrate US-Denmark tensions over Greenland. Dmitriev: 'The transatlantic alliance is over.' Medvedev mocks European inability to respond.

quotes.Medvedev: MAGA = Make Denmark Small Again = Make Europe Poor Again

title: ICE Deploys 2000 Agents to Minneapolis
description: ICE announces 'largest immigration operation ever' deploying 2,000 federal agents to Minneapolis area.

title: Heritage Foundation Publishes Project 2025 'Mandate for Leadership'
description: Heritage Foundation publishes 922-page policy document outlining comprehensive conservative agenda for next administration. 140+ contributors.

title: Operation Absolute Resolve - US Military Intervention in Venezuela
description: US military extraction of Maduro from Venezuela. No prior congressional authorization. Senate war powers resolution failed 50-50 (VP Vance tiebreaker).
note: War powers bypass is significant institutional precedent

title: US Imposes Tariffs on 8 NATO Allies Over Greenland
description: US imposes 10-25% tariffs on Denmark, Norway, Sweden, France, Germany, UK, Netherlands, Finland in connection with Greenland territorial pressure.

title: NATO Allies Deploy to Greenland - Operation Arctic Endurance
description: 8 NATO allies deploy military forces to Greenland in response to US territorial pressure. Denmark preparing Article 5 defense framework.
note: Unprecedented: NATO allies deploying to defend against US

title: 8 NATO Allies Issue Joint Statement on Greenland Crisis
description: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, UK issue joint statement condemning Trump's Greenland pressure as risking 'dangerous downward spiral' that undermines transatlantic relations.

title: WEF Annual Meeting 2026 Opens - First Danish Boycott
description: 56th World Economic Forum begins in Davos. Denmark boycotts for first time in WEF history due to US Greenland pressure. Theme: 'A Spirit of Dialogue' - actual focus: US-Europe crisis management.
note: First NATO ally boycott of WEF due to US actions

title: Von der Leyen Calls US Tariffs 'A Mistake' at Davos
description: EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen publicly criticizes proposed US tariffs as 'a mistake...especially between long-standing allies' at WEF.
quote: The proposed additional tariffs are a mistake... especially between long-standing allies.

title: Macron Warns of US Economic Subordination at Davos
description: French President Macron warns at WEF that US trade policy 'openly aims to weaken and subordinate Europe', calling it 'crazy'.
quote: Competition from the United States of America through trade agreements that undermine our export interests, demand maximum concessions, and openly aim to weaken and subordinate Europe... This is crazy.

title: EU Discusses Anti-Coercion Instrument Against US
description: EU considers first-ever activation of anti-coercion instrument ('trade bazooka') against the United States. €93-108B in retaliatory tariffs being drafted.
note: Would be first use of anti-coercion instrument against US

title: First Polish-Ottoman Diplomatic Contact
description: Ottoman Sultan Mehmed I Çelebi receives first Polish diplomatic delegation in Bursa, four years after Battle of Grunwald. Beginning of 600+ years of unbroken relations.

title: Polish-Hungarian Defensive Alliance
description: Poland and Hungary establish defensive alliance, beginning over 1000 years of documented friendship. Foundation for 'Polak Węgier dwa bratanki' tradition.

title: Iran and Ottoman Empire Refuse to Recognize Poland's Partition
description: Iran (Persia) and Ottoman Empire are only two countries to refuse recognition of Poland's partition by Austria, Prussia, and Russia.

title: Polish-Romanian Defensive Alliance Signed
description: Poland and Romania sign Convention on Defensive Alliance, committing mutual aid if attacked 'at present Eastern frontiers.' Only successful Intermarium bilateral treaty.

title: Polish-Turkish Treaty of Perpetual Friendship
description: Poland becomes first European country to sign friendship treaty with Republic of Turkey. Basis for modern strategic partnership.

title: 120,000 Polish Troops Evacuate Through Romania
description: After German invasion, approximately 120,000 Polish troops evacuate through Romanian Bridgehead to neutral Romania and Hungary. Most later join Polish Armed Forces in West.

title: Iran Shelters 120,000 Polish Refugees from Soviet Deportation
description: Iran welcomes approximately 120,000 Polish refugees from Soviet deportation. Shah provides private gardens as camps. Isfahan becomes 'City of Polish Children' (2,300 orphans). Over 2,800 Poles died in Iran and are buried in Polish cemeteries.

title: Bucharest Nine (B9) Founded
description: Nine NATO eastern flank states form B9 format on initiative of Presidents Duda (Poland) and Iohannis (Romania). Members: Poland, Romania, Hungary, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania.

title: Three Seas Initiative Inaugural Summit - Dubrovnik
description: 12 EU states between Baltic, Black, and Adriatic seas hold first 3SI summit in Dubrovnik, Croatia. Initiative announced by President Duda in August 2015. Modern incarnation of Intermarium concept.

title: Finland and Sweden First Attend B9 Meeting
description: Prime Minister of Sweden and President of Finland attend B9 meeting for first time, signaling Nordic-Central European security integration.

title: Polish PM Tusk Attends NB8 Summit in Harpsund
description: Swedish PM Kristersson invites Polish PM Tusk to Nordic-Baltic summit, reflecting deepening Polish integration with Nordic security architecture.
